about_the_game:
Take a thrilling ride through the rich and dynamic Asian automotive culture with "The Eastern Drive" - an exciting indie casual driving game that showcases a wide range of vehicles including SUVs, sedans, hatchbacks, and iconic local cars on lively virtual streets.

Step into the driver's seat and embrace the game's laid-back and relaxing vibe. As you explore the bustling metropolis, you'll encounter a wide selection of unique Asian vehicles. Each car boasts its own distinct personality, bringing a sense of authenticity and charm to your driving adventures. Embark on an exhilarating automotive adventure with our car game, where you'll pilot a stunning array of Asian-inspired vehicles. Drawing inspiration from the automotive powerhouses of Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, Indonesia, India, Sri Lanka, Vietnam, Thailand, China, and the Philippines

For those seeking a sense of purpose and challenge, take on a variety of missions tailored to test your driving skills. Navigate through the bustling traffic to complete 20 thrilling delivery missions, where precision and time management are key to your success. Alternatively, experience the thrill of being a law enforcer as you undertake 10 cop chase missions, ensuring that the city remains safe and secure. Complete different missions to earn money and unlock faster and better vehicles.

Feeling the need for speed? Satisfy your racing instincts with the Time Trail mode. Push these exquisite Asian vehicles to their limits as you engage in thrilling races against the clock

But wait, there's more – showcase your stunt driving skills and discover hidden collectibles scattered throughout the city, adding an extra layer of excitement to your journey.

Experience a unique driving feel with a variety of Asian urban vehicles in "The Eastern Drive" - perfect for car enthusiasts and casual gamers alike.

Features


  • Unique Asian Vehicles including Sedans, Hatchbacks, SUVs and compact cars.
  • 3 Game modes Free Roam, Time Trial, Missions
  • Casual and Relaxing driving experience
  • Progress Tracking system and the Best Game for Speedrunning.
  • 20 Delivery Missions
  • 10 Cop Chase Missions
  • Stunt Driving & Collectables
  • Ragdoll Pedestrians
  • Vibrant Open World City
  • Traffic and Pedestrians
  • Customization Options

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD RX560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 / RX 5500M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A fun and casual car driving game with Asian vehicles. Perform stunts, undertake missions, or freely cruise around the city.
